cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - MORNING - 13th APRIL, 1918.1* Our line is reported to run as followsGIVENCHY - FESTUBERT - LOGON S. BOIS de PACAUT * East of ROBECQ - North of CORBIE - le VERTBOIS - Pt. T0UR1JA1TT -ARREFAGGE - 11EPINETTE - Between MERRIS and OUTTEEISTEENE just South of BAILLEUL.Along this front there have been no heavy attacks and the situation appears to he satisfactory.Heavy attacks were launched at 9 a.m. this morning against NEUVE-EGLISE and WULVERGHEM, both of which villages are reported to be in enemy hands.2. Reinforcements are now arriving behind the battle-front, and the French are coming up in support with satisfactory speed.3. An extension of the present front of attack has not developed.General Staff,War Office, S.W.1, 13th April, 1918.Issued at 1.10 p.m.
